preference.name: CAE_structure_expansion_filter_rules
preference.preference_description: Defines all types of structure expansion rules that are available for analysts to perform a CAE BOM comparison. Valid Values: Array of strings: All Levels CAE First Level Only CAE Leaf Level Only CAE All Visible Levels CAE Lowest Visible Level Only
